showerReviews.reviewText: Very neat and clean truck stop. Very well organised. Shower waits were normal In a real busy time. Well done management and staff. Thanks for letting us use your facilities

Shower for professional drivers cost something like $18. You'd think for that much you could get a shower where "cleaning it" doesn't simply mean letting it dry and putting new towels in it. Towels that they can't seem to ever get actually ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ They r still doing a little work, but u can stop on in to get ur faves. I'll let u know how the showers r next week when we stop back through. ‚Ä¶

Registered for shower on the app. It said 34 guests ahead. 2 hours later it still said 34 guests ahead. I went inside only to have the manager on duty be extremely rude and dismissive about the problem that they are having with their system ‚Ä¶
It's a nice place but the showers take a long time, 1 hour only 4 people took the shower.

‚Ä¶ keep their job) and are helpful and really seem to like drivers. The showers are awesome-the updated versions with two shower heads and a built in bench. The gentleman cleaning showers was really pleasant and was to literally everyone. He ‚Ä¶

The description says there are 12 shower stalls, but in 2 hours only 3 have become available. They are working very slowly.
Waited almost 2 hours to get a shower 7/17 214pm, definitely needs lots of improvements, more friendlier and cleaner is definitely needed as well. ‚Ä¶

Came to the store and I was greeted at the door. Took a shower,  it was nice and refreshing clean as well. General manager James good customer service smile on his face good attitude good guy all the way around and manager Ron had good ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ this truck stop for over 20 years I never got poorly treated like this the same thing when I went to go take a shower the guy argue with me I asked him for an extra towel he said management said they're not allowed to give extra towels what ‚Ä¶

For a petro it‚Äôs actually pretty good! Shower was decent, had a new shower head that worked great. Bathroom wasn‚Äôt extremely disgusting, pretty decent actually. Lot isn‚Äôt too bad either, I didn‚Äôt notice any extreme smells or trash lying ‚Ä¶
Great food!!! Awesome staff, very friendly. Store however is a little on the small side. Shower rooms and restrooms are beautiful and clean. Lounge area is very nice as well.

Absolutely degenerate staff, I have spent a $800 fuel bill with a team driver. And one driver went to shower while the other was in the cab. This is at 2am with no one at all on the pump. She walks in and starts knocking on my shower door ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Bear was good for me better than the skillet. Redeem your ultra credit for a decent meal. I had good service. Looked clean but I didn‚Äôt shower so can‚Äôt comment on that. Was able to find a spot at noon easy enough. Did fill up overnight
No wait for a shower at 6pm on Tuesday.. Clean, good laundry room, quiet TV room, best restaurant in a chain truck stop, service bays, and a Blue Beacon
I had Shower #4 & it was awesome. Hot water, great pressure, and plenty of room to maneuver. The shower was very clean as well. Will definitely return next time I'm in San Antonio. ‚Ä¶

I‚Äôve always found parking. Great Mexican food across the street. That‚Äôs about it with this place. Showers are pretty bad. No venting so it‚Äôs super humid. Shower floor slope is pretty bad so be careful not to slip. Gotta move the bench if ‚Ä¶
Fuel desk fella was very nice.  Store attendant was very nice as well.  Shower room was small but shower was nice and hot... but y'all need exhaust fans to help with steam issues.

Like any other Petro, only thing that sucked about this place is that they no longer do Team Showers. Each individual driver needs to provide their own Ultra One card to shower. Just fueled over $400 dollars and I received 1 shower. Asked ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ secure place to park and this definitely did that very clean facilities, washer and dryers are free manager as sweet as pie women. This is a safe place for you to come and be towels are provided for the shower. Also, couldn't ask for more
Clean amazing. Safe and secure. The shower and laundry well worth it. Also the grass for pups to walk on is nice.

‚Ä¶ secure and impeccably CLEAN. They have a truckers lounge you can hang out in that has FREE showers, a TV, microwave, a sink if you need to wash dishes and to top that all that off washers and dryers are free also! No need for laundry soap ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ The shower was actually decent. Great water pressure there. The parking lot is like an off-roading adventure. I wouldn't go to the very back lot of the truck stop. They've got some potholes that would knock your socks off. I got stuck in ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ won't tow those trlrs which is Even better because then that means less free parking and you'll have to buy a spot showers is disgusting looks like theirs dirt in the floor and the door doesn't work properly so if you want a shower better ‚Ä¶

I'm a truck driver .I'm there 3 days a week. Luv that you can take a shower and they are very clean.also the restrooms. But never the less there men that are very didrty.my hat goes of to who ever cleans the showers and the restrooms.thanks

Showers are great. $16 for shower and can be used by a couple.
$2.89 for cheapest cup of coffee. :(
You can rest here without getting harassed.
Top Tier gas at competitive prices.
Did I mention $2.89 for cheapest cup of coffee
:(
Shower room could be a bit cleaner, n the shower pressure sucks n it soft water.
I recently had a very disappointing experience at the TA Petro showers. The cleanliness of the showers was severely lacking, and it was evident that they were not properly maintained or cleaned. ‚Ä¶

There have been numerous times I've come here, usually between midnight and 2am, coming in to shower and sleep. Each time I have used the shower, there was the same employee either standing outside my shower door, or the cleaning cart was ‚Ä¶

Stopped at TA for shower after back country camping for a week. Best money spent this year!  While my expectations were low the showers were like going to a hotel. Clean, private bathroom, clean towels, soap and shampoo. Thoroughly ‚Ä¶

Huge shower rooms. Great water temperature.  Fair water pressure.  Food options are Burger King, Popeyes and Fazzolis.  Fazzolis was closed due to thermostat issues in the dining room.  Don't come hungry after 8pm.

Beware
Drivers are stealing showers without paying.

I paid for a shower.
Waited 30 minutes then noticed my number was no longer on the TV.

Basically someone took my shower without paying.

I got a refund and left.
